description: Build SEO hub page with spoke content using hub-and-spoke architecture

files.reason: Contains target keywords for hub page optimization and spoke content generation
Defines hub topic structure and spoke content relationships for internal linking

data.impact: Without complete keyword data, hub pages cannot be optimized for search intent and spoke pages cannot be properly clustered
Without hub structure data, internal linking strategy cannot be implemented and topical authority cannot be established

commands.name: keyword-opportunity-scan
